alert.note: Alert for Northern Centre; Northern Clinton; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 2:11PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL CENTRE AND EASTERN CLINTON COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM EDT... At 210 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Lock Haven, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Lock Haven, Carroll, Woodward, Lamar, Zion, Mill Hall, Avis, Dunnstown, Flemington, Castanea, Millheim, Blanchard, Aaronsburg, McElhattan, Rebersburg, Coburn, Madisonburg, Monument, Glen Union and Bald Eagle State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central and north central Pennsylvania.

area.areaDesc: Northern Centre; Northern Clinton; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton
